message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential benefits for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value I can get out of the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  While I understand your perspective, I believe the value this product brings justifies a higher price. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
I'm willing to consider your revised offer, Alice, but I still think we can find a better price. I'm willing to go up to $9,800. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be fair, I'm willing to come down slightly more.  My final offer is $10,000. I believe this represents a fair deal for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $9,600. Can you meet me there?
